definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: This is a famous gray-beard gathering place.
sentences.chinese: 这儿是一个有名的老年人聚集的地方。

sentences.english: Oh dear, I'd been looking forward to warmer weather here.
sentences.chinese: 噢天啊，我原期望这儿会有较暖和的天气。

sentences.english: Here's a tree that we can shelter under.
sentences.chinese: 这儿有一棵我们可以躲雨的树。

sentences.english: But here I am and there you are and it is the moment of and for Veritas.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我还是要站在这儿，跟你们聊聊。

sentences.english: Thank you for taking the time to come over.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢您特地来我们这儿。

sentences.english: Look, Mike. Here'rethe jade bracelets you want.
sentences.chinese: 麦克，你看，这儿有你要买的玉手镯。

sentences.english: You couldn't drag that information out of me.
sentences.chinese: 你休想从我这儿套出消息。

sentences.english: You've the only person that Imet here.
sentences.chinese: 你是我在这儿遇见的唯一的一个人。

sentences.english: He thought of here, go down the windows fly.
sentences.chinese: 他想到这儿，顺着窗户飞了下去。

sentences.english: “There’s a lot of talent here,” Diop said.
Don't lack the ball about. Can't you see it is crowded here?
sentences.chinese: 不要乱踢球，你看不见这儿很挤吗？

sentences.english: Well, it all looks so good. How about ordering the steamed prawns?
sentences.chinese: 这儿的菜看着都不错，我们要一份蒸虾怎么样？

sentences.english: We have lived in Linqing since we came here.
sentences.chinese: 自从我们到这儿以来，我们就一直住在临清。

sentences.english: This place is close and convenient to the street-car.

definition: variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment/also written 哪裡|哪里
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
